code: import React from"react";import dateFormat from"dateformat";export var displayDate=function displayDate(dateStart){var todayDate=new Date();var eventDate=new Date(dateStart);if(todayDate<eventDate){return dateFormat(eventDate,"mmmm dS, h:MM TT");}else{return"".concat(dateFormat(eventDate,"mmmm dS, h:MM TT")," - (PAST)");}};
